amendment.description: At the end of division D (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this division is hereby reduced by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to reduce spending in Division D, State, Foreign Operations, and Related Agencies, by 1 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A090) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 293 (Roll no. 340).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A090) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 293 (Roll no. 340).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A090) offered by Mr. Allen.
